dataTypes.text.intro: These are the data types {{name}} shares up to {{sharingCount}} times with other companies. E.g. information about {{mostSharedType}} is shared {{mostSharedCount}} times.
dataTypes.text.grouping: Data types can be grouped into different categories:
dataTypes.text.correlations: When data types are shared in a packet rather than individually, they provide further insight.
construction.text: This part is currently under construction, but you can go through it if you're curious.
